item.description:
*Saturday May 2nd* *Anthony's, 105 Canal St, Malden* *8 PM - 1 AM (maybe 2)*

*Upstairs Ballroom w/one of the largest dance floors around*
*Terrific hor's douevres included*
*Safe & Secure free parking with outside attendants*
*****NO JEANS OR SNEAKERS*****
*I would appreciate you registering only if you plan on attending*
*We'll have some meet & greet tables, reserved for MeetUp too.
*SHOULD BE PLENTY OF NEW FACES AT THIS NEW LOCATION*
***Only $10 per person***

We have approximately 100 people attending from other groups, so it should be a great time.

Any questions email me @ WhatsAngeloDoing@comcast.net
item.how_to_find_us: Seek and ye shall find. I'll be on the dance floor.
item.name: Let's play in May
